leader. Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain an adviser to Larry Page and Google's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , as Google's executive chairman. The changes will be effective April 4. Larry Page praised Eric Schmidt . There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly. The change in command overshadowed Google's fourth-quarter earnings, which soared past analysts' estimates as the company cranked up its Internet marketing machine during the holiday shopping season.
